title: OnTime for Wear
summary: Planner for your daily public transport trips on your Wear device.
description: What is OnTime for Wear?On Time for Wear is planner for your daily public transport trips on your Wear device. - Add notifications and never think again that you might miss your public transport. - Forget time and have your morning coffee in peace or focus on work in the office. You will be notified On Time when you need to go. - Live info from public transport vehicles that you can trust on your smart watch.How OnTime for Wear works? - Add your notifications for stops and transport lines -> It is as simple and easy as using your daily alarm app - Forget about it and focus on things that are important -> Your smart watch will notify you On Time with live info so you know exactly when to go.Supported cities: - Tallinn (Estonia)
descriptionHTML:
What is OnTime for Wear?

On Time for Wear is planner for your daily public transport trips on your Wear device.
- Add notifications and never think again that you might miss your public transport.
- Forget time and have your morning coffee in peace or focus on work in the office. You will be notified On Time when you need to go.
- Live info from public transport vehicles that you can trust on your smart watch.


How OnTime for Wear works?

- Add your notifications for stops and transport lines -> It is as simple and easy as using your daily alarm app
- Forget about it and focus on things that are important -> Your smart watch will notify you On Time with live info so you know exactly when to go.


Supported cities:
- Tallinn (Estonia)
